{"id":1000065029,"question_id":3,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 year, 4 months","timestamp":1689932694,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"1064 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1000065029/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters","memory":"244 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int lengthOfLongestSubstring(string s) {\n        \n        int max_length = 0;\n\n        for(int i=0; i<s.length(); i++){\n\n            int len = 0;\n            unordered_map<char,int> M;\n\n            for(int j=i; j<s.length(); j++){\n                if(M[s[j]]){\n                    break;\n                }\n                else{\n                    len += 1;\n                    M[s[j]] = 1;\n                }\n            }\n\n            max_length = (max_length > len)?max_length:len;\n        }\n\n        return max_length;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"longest-substring-without-repeating-characters","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
